mods.note: VO-125 Political Agency, Bahrain. July 23, I960. Dear Residency, We forward herewith sixteen appeals which are awaiting hearing by the Chief Court. It is understood that Judge Haines who will hear v these appeals, will use the Agency Court Room. It is, therefore, requested that the appeals be numbered and sent to us ready for hearing as soon as possible. Yours ever, The Persian Gulf Residency, BMRAIN.V0/138/50 Political Agency, Bahrain. August 12,1950. Dear Residency, Please refer to our letter No.VO-125 of July 23rd. We forward herewith an appeal recently filed together with the relevant case for hearing by the Chief Court. Yours ever, AGENCY. The Political Residency, BAHRAIN.\ ( The Political Kesidencyi Bahrain* With the Compliments of the Political Agent, Bahrain. • ••••• No. VO/141 Bncl. Appeal dated the 18th August filed by Mohamed bin Rashid AlMihri, the attorney of Amnah bint Abdur Rahim. -(E The Chief Court for Bahrain, The Residency, Bahrain. 15th December, 1950. Sir, I have the honour to transmit to you, herewith, copies of the judgements and decrees (where issued) of the Chief Court in the following Civil Appeals No. 1 of 1950 No. 2 of 1950 No. 3 of 1950 No. 4 of 1949 against suit No. 315/49. ' “ No. 512/49. ” ” No. 184 of 1950. “ ' No. 86 of 1949. and copies of the judgements and decrees (where issued) in the following Appeals together with the records of the case which had been sent to the Chief Court for perusal: - No. 5 of 1950 against suit No. 844/49. No. 6 of 1950 H u No* 840/48. No. 8 of 1950 H It No. 152/50. No. 9 of 1949 It tt No. 318/49. No. 10 of 1950 U tt No. 824/49. No. 11 of 1950 H tt No. 776/49. No. 1 3 of 1950 !» tt No. 65/50. No. 14 of ’50 t» tt No. 924/49. No. 1? of 1950 t» tt No. 26/48. 'V of the Court of the Political Agent, BAHRAIN. I have the honour to be, Sir, Your most obedient Servant, t Assistant Judge.INDIA OFFICE RECORDS ?2.J2t — MICROFILM

location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'File E/25 SUBMISSION OF APPEALS TO THE CHIEF COURT BAHRAIN.'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

The foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1 and terminates at the inside back cover with 12; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio. An additional foliation sequence is present in parallel between ff 2-11; these numbers are also written in pencil, but are not circled

mods.abstract: The file contains correspondence regarding the lists of appeals which are awaiting hearing by the Chief Court for Bahrain, at the Persian Gulf Political Residency.The main correspondence is between the Political Agency, Bahrain, and the Chief Court for Bahrain, at the Persian Gulf Political Residency.
